availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Williamstown, Kentucky, blacksmith. Ireland native. Married to Martha Anne Ponder Bannon on October 21, 1855. Father of Thomas Bannon, James Bannon, Andrew Bannon, and Rebecca J. Bannon. Blacksmith in Williamstown in 1860. Served in the Holloway Volunteer Kentucky Regiment (C.S.A.) as a captain.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, Williamstown, p. 182.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, Williamstown, p. 6.
